subject: p19182863
Findings: In comparison with study of, there has been a substantial increase in the degree of right pleural effusion, which extends upward on the frontal view to almost the level of the carina. There may be mild shift of the mediastinum to the left, though there is probably substantial volume loss in the right lower lung. The left lung is essentially clear. Otherwise, little change.
